translations: 撒尿，小便（pee的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: That evening, Bill and Hillary were getting ready for bed. Hillary turned to Bill and said, "Well, I found out who peed in your saxophone."
sentences.translation: 那晚，比尔和希拉里正要睡觉。希拉里转过身来跟比尔说道：“好吧，我知道是谁往你的萨克斯管里撒尿了。”

sentences.sentence: There was an astronaut who peed in his spacesuit before liftoff-- a seemingly inauspicious start to what became the first American manned spaceflight.
sentences.translation: 曾经有一个宇航员在起飞前尿到了他的宇航服里——这对美国的第一次载人航天飞行来说似乎是一个不祥的开始。

sentences.sentence: Maybe all this started when I peed on the Blarney stone.
sentences.translation: 也许一切始于我在布拉尼之石上撒尿。
